xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/620613-Blue Revolution 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wLLwuqezSnUywavr3Dz0mgNoJe7.jpg An official, behind the scenes, feature-length film, Blue Revolution follows the Chelsea FC team and its passionate supporters through Jose Mourinho's first three seasons with Chelsea, 2004-2007. It was nothing short of an uprising that produced 6 trophies in three years and an immeasurable quantity of drama both on and off the pitch. Blue Revolution
